Uses of Observer in simulator.simobjects
 

Subinterfaces of Observer in simulator.simobjects
 interface SimObject
          Simulation object which implement the observable and observer pattern to be able to connect every objects together so that they react to both internal simulation events, external events from the scenario and events received from the LAS.
 

Classes in simulator.simobjects that implement Observer
 class Ambulance
          Simulation object encapsulating the state of an ambulance.
 class BasicObject
          Basic object serving demonstration purposes
 class Incident
          Simulation object encapsulating the state of the incident
 class Map
          Provide a way to store the obstacles in the town and encapsulate the path finding every ambulance use will moving
 class SimObjectImpl
